title: 397 dengue patients hospitalised in 24 hours
body: The Directorate General of Health Services on Saturday said that no death from dengue was reported across the country in the past 24 hours, while 397 dengue patients were admitted to different hospitals during the same period. According to the release, among the newly-admitted patients, 52 were hospitalised in Barishal division (outside city corporation), 59 in Chattogram division (outside city corporation), 53 in Dhaka division, 105 in Dhaka North City Corporation, 75in Dhaka South City Corporation, 14 in Khulna division (outside city corporation), 18 in Mymensingh division (outside city corporation), 19 in Rajshahi division (outside city corporation) and two in Sylhet division (outside city corporations). During the past 24 hours, 413 dengue patients were discharged from different hospitals. With this, a total of 98,282 dengue patients have been released from hospitals, so far, this year. A total of 404 dengue-related deaths have been recorded, so far, this year. In 2024, the country reported 1,01,214 dengue cases and 575 deaths from the mosquito-borne disease.
